Package de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.io

Everything that has to do with serialization or deserialization is in this package.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FileExt Here are the supported file extensions placed.
XMLStartupTag Summarizes XML tag elements of startup XML file.
 

Class Summary
Ecore Load class is designed to deserialize *.ecore files.
PhysicalDummyFile Here is the physical file created we use as a dummy for each artefact generated when it is of artefact type document and has all constraints set to create a file.
XMLStartup This class makes use of the SAX2 parser to deserialize startup XML file and uses JDOM to serialize updates on any XML file used by the application.
XMLStartupHandler The job of this class is to extend the default handler for SAX events and is an customized event handler class.
XMLTestDataCollection This class has the job of saving the generated test data collection as a physical XML file to the file system.
 

Package de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.io Description

Everything that has to do with serialization or deserialization is in this package.
